wikipedia_page.main: Martin Stopford is a British economist and has had careers as a teacher, writer, information provider and business manager.  Stopford is regularly quoted by The Economist, the Financial Times, Bloomberg and Lloyds List. He received a Lloyd's List Lifetime Achievement Award in 2010. He is a director of Clarksons plc, the world's largest shipbroker.
